creator: mkain@tesco-inc.com
text:
When running my scripts I get the following error: 2001-09-17 11:32:16 - 
path="" :Error: /usr/local/apache/sites/tesco.spinweb.net/htdocs/cmi/courses\3M/
Introduction/3m_intro.html (No such file or directory)

Nothing in the script would cause "\" to replace "/" which points to the 
correct path.
